name: Vedanta : Update payment processed status in vpanel

parameters.query: =update sdv_shipments set payment_status='payment_to_process' where payment_due_date='{{$node["Setting due day from present date"].json["date"]}}' and payment_status ='payment_pending' and shipment_Status IN ('grn_partially_accepted', 'grn_completed') and payment_received_from_client
